rotate_usb.description: Rotate the USB around its axis.

compact_usb.description: Rotate the USB to compact state.

expand_usb.description: Rotate the USB to an expanded state.

no_action_applicable.description: No action applicable due to fixed joint.

clean_usb_body.description: Clean the USB body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_whole_usb.description: Clean the entire USB including the body and rotation part.

clean_usb_body.description: Clean the USB body to remove dust or any other particles.

clean_usb_rotation.description: Clean the USB connector prongs to ensure proper connection.
